svg.text: Multiple Dark Theme Variations for Tech Device Repair
OLED-friendly with pure black backgrounds. High contrast for readability. Best for mobile OLED screens.
✓ Perfect for OLED displays ✓ Maximum contrast ✓ Battery efficient on mobile
⚠ Can cause eye strain in bright environments ⚠ Very harsh contrast
Balanced dark theme with warm tones. Comfortable for extended viewing. Best for desktop and general use.
✓ Comfortable for long viewing ✓ Warm and professional ✓ Works well in any lighting
✓ RECOMMENDED: Best balance of aesthetics and usability
Cool blue-gray backgrounds with refined gold. Modern tech aesthetic. Good for reducing eye strain.
✓ Reduces eye strain ✓ Modern tech look (GitHub-inspired) ✓ Professional blue tones
⚠ Cool tones may feel less warm/welcoming for repair business
Rich charcoal with warm amber tones. Luxurious and premium feel. Great for brand differentiation.
✓ Premium luxurious feel ✓ Warm and inviting ✓ Unique brand identity
⚠ Less common, may not feel familiar ⚠ Warmer tones can vary on different displays
Deep blue backgrounds with elegant champagne gold. Professional and trustworthy. Financial/tech industry standard.
✓ Professional and trustworthy ✓ Elegant color combination ✓ Good brand perception
⚠ Blue may feel corporate/formal rather than friendly repair shop
Neutral slate with rose gold accents. Modern and elegant. Appeals to broader demographic.
✓ Elegant and modern ✓ Appeals to wider audience ✓ Softer than pure gold
⚠ Deviates from your established gold brand color
Semantic colors for success, error, warning, and info states - optimized for dark backgrounds
These semantic colors provide consistent feedback across all dark mode options.
1. Start with Option 2 (Soft Dark & Warm Gold) - best balance for your repair business
2. Test on multiple devices (phones, tablets, desktops) in different lighting conditions
3. Consider offering a manual toggle so users can switch between light/dark modes
4. Use the prefers-color-scheme media query to auto-detect user preference
Tech Device Repair - Dark Mode Palette Options - October 2025
